mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM p_oc WHERE create_date = #{createDate}

SELECT oc1.batch_no,oc1.line_no,oc1.oc_status,oc1.oli_content,DATE_FORMAT(oc1.create_date, '%Y-%m-%d %T') create_date FROM (SELECT batch_no,line_no,oc_status,oli_content,create_date FROM p_oc WHERE oc_status=0 AND DATE(create_date)=#{createDate}) oc1, (SELECT batch_no,line_no FROM p_oc WHERE oc_status=1 AND DATE(create_date)=#{createDate}) oc2 WHERE oc1.batch_no=oc2.batch_no AND oc1.line_no=oc2.line_no UNION SELECT batch_no,line_no,oc_status,oli_content,create_date FROM p_oc WHERE oc_status=1 AND DATE(create_date)=#{createDate} ORDER BY batch_no,line_no,oc_status
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM p_oc WHERE batch_no=#{batchNo} AND line_no=#{lineNo} AND create_date=#{createDate}
mapper.update: UPDATE p_oc SET oc_status=0 WHERE batch_no=#{batchNo} AND line_no=#{lineNo} AND create_date=#{createDate}
